text: Hey! Have you seen the new SUICIDE SQUAD movie?

I just watched it recently and 
it’s pretty cool! So I wanted

to bring you a lesson featuring my favorite 
character from the franchise, Harley Quinn!

Now, Harley is a total wild card!
What does that mean?
You’ll find out in this lesson!

And if you are new here, every week we bring you 
lessons with your favorite movies and series,

so that you can understand fast English without 
getting lost, without missing the jokes,

and without subtitles! Like Patricio who says 
that this is the only real way to learn new words!

So if you want to take your English 
to the next level like he has,

hit that subscribe button and the bell down 
below so you don’t miss a single new lesson!

In your opinion, who do you think is the 
most badass superhero? Pause the video,

comment below and let me know, which superhero 
would you most like us to make a lesson with?

You can also give likes to other 
learner’s suggestions to vote for them!

So if you’re watching this, I’m guessing 
you dig superhero movies. Why not continue

your learning with what is arguably one of the 
best superhero movies of all time--Avengers:

End Game? Let’s watch a short 
taste of our lesson with that!
